content: **crocheted christmas decoration/ wreath in drops safran theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #minichristmaswreath drops design pattern e-404 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx 6 cm in diameter **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 60 moss green 50 g colour 19 red 1 wreath weighs approx 4 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 double crochets in width and 26 row vertically on hook size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember remember that the hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized hook or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized hook
